title: Manchester United total revenue 2009 to 2019
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2019 to 2015.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2014 to 2012.
Similarly, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2011 to 2009.
Additionally, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2015 to 2014.
Conversely, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2012 to 2011.
gold: The statistic depicts the revenue of the Premier League club Manchester United from 2009 to 2019 . In the fiscal year 2019 , Manchester United generated around 796.4 million U.S. dollars in revenue .
